The patient presented with acute refractory UGIB, and a source was identified as venous blood that opened up during attempted sclerosing. Gastric ulcers were also seen on previous banding sites. The patient's respiratory status is unclear whether he was intubated for ethanol withdrawal or for esophagogastroduodenoscopy (EGD). He received paralysis for EGD and for medical flight.
